class.name: .fv-col-${media}-${size}
class.description: Static column for current and above media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-${media}-${size}
class.description: Column offset for current and above media

class.name: .fv-col-only-${media}-${size}
class.description: Static column for only current media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-only-${media}-${size}
class.description: Column offset for only current media

class.name: .fv-col-lower-${media}-${size}
class.description: Static column for current and lower media

class.name: .fv-col-offset-lower-${media}-${size}
class.description: Column offset for current and lower media

note: Framevuerk grid system inspired from Bootstrap grid system.
${media} field in all classes can be one of xl, lg, md, sm and xs and ${size} can be a number between 0 to 12.
Every .fv-row and .fv-col${x} classes has half of padding value from user variables. You can disable it by using .fv-no-padding class.
